sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Incidental, out of turn) When the character inflicts a Critical Injury with a Brawl, Melee, or Lightsaber weapon, they may suffer 1 strain to change the result to an Easy (1 difficulty die) Critical Injury result.  Additionally, whenever the character defeats a minion or rival NPC, they may always choose to do so by nonlethal means, even if the environment or exceptional circumstances would normally make that very difficult or impossible.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Precision Strike</name> <number>TAL0001305</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>ben.fisher</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-01-26 15:58:37</sys_created_on> <sys_id>a04e88e52f110110e0f497eef699b6e4</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>ben.fisher</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-01-26 15:58:37</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
